reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 499/01: CHANGES TO THE OXFORD COUNTY BOARD OF HEALTH
reg_info.reg_name_text: CHANGES TO THE OXFORD COUNTY BOARD OF HEALTH
reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act   Loi sur les municipalités

content.content: 1. (1) The council of the County of Oxford may change the composition of the Oxford County Board of Health to be the same as the composition of the council of the County of Oxford, effective immediately upon the passing of the by-law. O. Reg. 499/01, s. 1 (1). (2) Subsection (1) applies despite subsection 64 (1) of the County of Oxford Act. O. Reg. 499/01, s. 1 (2).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The council of the County of Oxford may change the composition of the Oxford County Board of Health to be the same as the composition of the council of the County of Oxford, effective immediately upon the passing of the by-law. O. Reg. 499/01, s. 1 (1).

(2) Subsection (1) applies despite subsection 64 (1) of the County of Oxford Act. O. Reg. 499/01, s. 1 (2).
